title: I can't play Sion now on my new computer
body:
So i was trying to play Sion in ranked on my new gaming P.C when I found when I try to use my Q-Decimating Smash i can't cancel and have to use my full charge which makes him almost impossible to use. I looked around and i haven't seen anyone have this problem. please if anyone knows how to fix this problem, contact me. Sion is one of my favorite champs to play and now he is virtually unplayable.

 -Wynut Zoidberg

replies.body: Hmm.. I've never heard of this issue before. Is it possible that you can take a quick recording of it and post it somewhere so I can take a look? There are many potential causes, but a video would give me more context. Also, can you let me know if you use smartcast with your keybindings or not? Thanks!
